segments.text: Here we are , Ryan ! This is where we're going to celebrate !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: lt's a TV palace ! I'm glad I brought my platinum card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You won't need it . Tom is going to treat everybody !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where is Tom ? It was his idea to have the bachelor party at a ETV , wasn't it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If it were up to Tom , we'd have the wedding in the ETV ? He loves to sing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then I bet he's really good !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , uh , I'll let you decided that for you yourself . He'll be here a little later . Here's our room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is where we sing ? These booths are so comfortable I think could fall asleep !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's order something to eat . What are you in the mood for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . How about some spring rolls and squid balls , some pork skins , and some beer !
segments.speaker: S1
